pageContext.claim: “...The Fake News will knowingly lie and demean in order make the tremendous success of the Trump Administration, and me, look as bad as possible. They use non-existent sources & write stories that are total fiction. Our Country is doing so well, yet this is a sad day in America!”
pageContext.analysis: Reputable news organizations do not make up sources. It is a fireable offense. Trump, whose White House officials often ask to speak to reporters anonymously, has a well known reputation for being an anonymous source to reporters over the years. News reports on Trump's administration that were initially based on anonymous sources are routinely confirmed as time passes and evidence emerges publicly.
